title: Map of Estevanicos Route - explain course concept

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe the role played by Africans such as Estevanico during the colonization of the Americas.Explain how Atlantic Creoles were similar to or different from another group of Africans in the diaspora.Explain how the work of African American Studies scholars has contributed to the understanding of developments such as those depicted in the source.

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, and C. skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
